alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 05 at 7:42PM CDT until July 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Eastern Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Lutie, or 9 miles north of Wellington, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado near Highway 83 near Samnorwood at 7:33 PM. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Samnorwood and Lutie. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
